text:
Correct me if I'm wrong, but I think that once you upgrade to Win10 and use a
Microsoft account then your Win10 key will be stored in the cloud and you can
reinstall it using the latest Win10 ISO. I've done this at least once on a
couple of home computers in the past. No need to reinstall Win7.

metadata.topic: Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs

metadata.email_text_original:
Win 7 no longer upgrading to Win10 - no more reinstalling PCs 
Correct me if I'm wrong, but I think that once you upgrade to Win10 and use a
Microsoft account then your Win10 key will be stored in the cloud and you can
reinstall it using the latest Win10 ISO. I've done this at least once on a
couple of home computers in the past. No need to reinstall Win7. 
On Wed, Oct 25, 2023 at 2:35 PM Winston Natoli <winston_mvp@outlook.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CAGaCHK5Q9N3aydWObunpaykyp0mVuV2XT0h-EUhXtB2wRdVb_w%40mail.gmail.com
